Name: Restricting general vending and food vending on certain streets.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to restricting general vending and food vending on certain streets.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
	Section 1.  Subdivision g of section 20-465 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding thereto a new paragraph three to read as follows:
	(3) No general vendor shall vend on the north side of 37th Avenue from and including 72nd Street to and including 82nd Street, on the south side of 37th Avenue from and including 72nd Street to and including the west side of 78th Street, on 72nd Street from and including 35th Avenue to and including Roosevelt Avenue, on 73rd Street from and including 35th Avenue to and including Roosevelt Avenue and on 74th Street from and including 35th Avenue to and including Roosevelt Avenue, all in the borough of Queens.
	§2.  Section 17-315 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding thereto a new subdivision m to read as follows: 
	m.  No food vendor shall vend on the north side of 37th Avenue from and including 72nd Street to and including 82nd Street, on the south side of 37th Avenue from and including 72nd Street to and including the west side of 78th Street, on 72nd Street from and including 35th Avenue to and including Roosevelt Avenue, on 73rd Street from and including 35th Avenue to and including Roosevelt Avenue and on 74th Street from and including 35th Avenue to and including Roosevelt Avenue, all in the borough of Queens.
	§3. This local law shall take effect immediately upon its enactment into law.

PH
Int 706/2005
